text: Gotham (also Richland City) is an unincorporated census-designated place, in the town of Buena Vista, in Richland County, Wisconsin, United States. It is located about an hour west of Madison, Wisconsin. As of the 2020 census, its population was 189. ==References== Category:Census-designated places in Wisconsin Category:Unincorporated communities in Wisconsin Category:Richland County, Wisconsin
title: Gotham, Wisconsin
